casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellee, v. Mentser, Appellant.

[Cite as State v. Mentser, 130 Ohio St.3d 262, 2011-Ohio-5446.]

(No. 2009-0273 Submitted October 18, 2011 Decided October 26, 2011.) David P. Fornshell, Warren County Prosecuting Attorney, and Michael Greer, Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, for appellee. George C. Luther, for appellant.

{¶ 1} The cause is remanded to the court of appeals for application of State v. Williams, 129 Ohio St.3d 344, 2011-Ohio-3374, 952 N.E.2d 1108.

O’Connor, C.J., and Pfeifer, Lundberg Stratton, Lanzinger, Cupp, and McGee Brown, JJ., concur. O’Donnell, J., dissents.
